channel.title: Camera keys: The keyboard keys that control camera in game
channel.description:
Hello all, i recently have been starting to look into private server's again, and might be thinking of different tactics and ways to do a few things but am i currently here to ask if anyone has the knowledge to share with me on how to change the camera keys, like the arrow keys.
I would like to switch the arrows keys with WASD keys.
Please and thankyou.

item.title: Camera keys: The keyboard keys that control camera in game
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_

item.source: Camera keys: The keyboard keys that control camera in game

item.title: Camera keys: The keyboard keys that control camera in game
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

generally the rs applet handles all key listeners, so yes. most likely it will be there.

if you already knew how to change the function keys, you should know where the camera is.

however, you will need to disable chat input for the chat box before doing so. make a certain key toggle chat input so that you can use wasd for camera, and you can type with wasd as well.

Read full topic
item.source: Camera keys: The keyboard keys that control camera in game

item.title: Camera keys: The keyboard keys that control camera in game

item.description:
@4ces0fsp4des wrote:

yes this is to be found within the rsapplet right? client sided.

I mean that’s how i used to change my fkeys anyways, but arrow keys too?

Read full topic
